HERO.title: Nuestras Cabañas
HERO.subtitle: Cada cabaña está completamente equipada para tu comodidad, con espacios amplios y acogedores.

ROOMS.name: Cabaña 1
ROOMS.description: Cada cabaña está completamente equipada para tu comodidad, con espacios amplios y acogedores, ideales para parejas, familias o aventureros que buscan desconectar y disfrutar de la belleza de San Pedro.

items.name: Almond Croissant
items.description: Buttery, flaky, filled with almond paste

SPECIAL_ITEMS.title: Special Orders & Catering
SPECIAL_ITEMS.description: Planning something special? We create custom cakes, pastry platters, and catering options for events of all sizes.
SPECIAL_ITEMS.note: Please place special orders at least 48 hours in advance. Contact us to discuss your needs!
